title: Scope Version Clash
description: The clash results for a scope version. This document only includes clash that are new or existing. Resolved clashes are not included.

cid.description: The clash ID in the scope version

ldid.description: The left-hand-side document ID in the scope version

loid.description: The left-hand-side object ID in the scope version

lvid.description: The left-hand-side viewable ID of the object

rdid.description: The right-and-side document ID in the scope version

roid.description: The right-hand-side object ID in the scope version

rvid.description: The right-hand-side viewable ID of the object
